exchange_rate_note: Bank exchange rates na the rates wey banks dey charge to exchange one currency for another. Parallel exchange rates na the rates wey independent foreign exchange dealers dey charge to exchange one currency for another. Parallel exchange rates dey usually better for customers because dem no dey subject to the same fees and charges like bank exchange rates.

Here, you fit provide tori about your products. Add as many products as you fit. We recommend say you add 10 or more products because more product mean more chance to make sales. You fit edit your product tori anytime.

price_inventory_info: Dem list the product price for USD for KWOT and you go pay with local currency or USD. We go use parallel exchange rates for payment. Bank exchange rates na the rates wey banks dey use change one currency to another. Parallel exchange rates na the rates wey independent foreign exchange dealers dey use change one currency to another. Parallel exchange rates usually beta for people because dem no dey charge the same fees and charges like bank exchange rates.

affiliates_program_help: Kwot Affiliates Program dey help content creators, publishers, and bloggers
create_Affiliate_profile: Create your Affiliate profile with us by filling up the joining form and get started in a few minutes.
affiliate_profile_approved: Once your Affiliate profile don approve and you don get the confirmation, you fit begin recommend Kwot and back-linking to us.
start_paying_commission: We go start pay you commission based on the quality and quantity of the web traffic wey you dey send us.
affiliate_program_offers: Kwot Affiliate Program dey offer opportunity for individuals and businesses to make commission by promoting Kwot marketplace and products. Kwot dey reward affiliate partners by tracking the quality and quantity of the web traffic wey dem dey send to Kwot.
pay_fee_affiliate_program: I gats pay fee to join the Affiliate program?
kwot_affiliate_program_free: No. Kwot Affiliate program na free. You no need to pay fee to join the program. You need to generate traffic within 180 days after you join the program to maintain your status, otherwise Kwot fit withdraw your affiliate privileges.
benefits_of_affiliate: Wetin be the benefits of joining Kwot Affiliate program?
affiliate_program_opportunity: Kwot Affiliate program dey offer opportunity for you to make money by promoting Kwot products and marketplace. You no need to worry about customer service or order processing as Kwot go take care of all that. All you need to do na promote Kwot and direct web traffic to Kwot.
kwot_affiliate_program: Who suppose join Kwot Affiliate program?
affiliate_program_ideal_influencers: Kwot Affiliate program dey ideal for influencers, bloggers, website or app owners. However, other marketers like email marketers fit also find the program useful and rewarding. If you dey interested to promote Kwot products, you fit give the Affiliate programs chance as e dey free to join.
register_start_earning: Register with us to start dey earn money by promoting Kwot.
joined_affiliates_program: Congratulations, you don join the Affiliates program
set_your_account: Set up your account and start to enjoy Kwot
edit_websites_mobile: Edit your websites and mobile apps
top_level_site_list: List all the top level websites and/or mobile apps wey you plan to display banners, widgets, Special Links, or other ads from Kwot Affiliates Program. You need to add at least one website or mobile app. You fit add up to 50 websites or mobile apps.

documentation_under_penalties: By typing my name on top the given date, I acknowledge say I dey sign the tax documentation under penalties of perjury.
affiliates_agreement: of the Affiliates Program operating agreement
kwot_affiliates_program: Thank you as you apply for Kwot Affiliates Program
occasionally_Associate_ID: Sometimes you fit need to provide your Associate ID to verify your account with us. We go review your application shortly after you don refer qualified sales to Kwot.com
meantime_granted_Associates: For now, we don give you full access to Associates Central 24 hours a day. If your affiliate links no don refer qualified sales after 180 days, we go withdraw your application and access to Associates Central.
top_level_website_app: List all the top level websites and/or mobile apps wey you plan to display banners, widgets, Special Links, or other ads from Kwot Affiliates Program. You need to add at least one website or mobile app. You fit add up to 50 websites or mobile apps.
chosen_affiliate_id: The chosen Affiliate ID go automatically dey used to create your Affiliate account ID. For example, 'your site' fit become tusitio-21, tusiti-21, site-21, etc.
online_marketplace_note: We be online marketplace wey dey focus on original African products.
product_seller_note: We provide platform for sellers of African products to market and sell their products globally with ease. With Kwot, sellers fit dey rest assured say business operations including order processing, shipping, and inventory management fit dey handled for cost effective and time efficient manner. Our integrated suite of marketplace offerings fit help SMEs set up their e-commerce business for global markets.
multi_vendor_marketplace_note: We be online multi-vendor marketplace wey connect African sellers to buyers all over the world.
e_commerce_platform_note: Kwot na the most comprehensive e-commerce platform of its kind for buyers of African products. We dey committed to provide access to authentic African products for people all over the world, including the African diaspora. We dey do this by providing a seamless experience to the users of Kwot and by enabling local producers of African products gain access to the global marketplace through a powerful yet easy-to-use technology platform.
buyer_product_note: We don build Kwot to make sellers and buyers of African products happy, and we go continue to launch new features on our platform to achieve this goal.
one_step_product: We dey aim to be the one-stop shop for African products.
b2b_product: Kwot B2B Store - di one stop shop for all African products.
b2b_product_note: We don design one customised platform for B2B buyers and sellers of African product so dat dem fit buy and sell more efficiently.
products_across_kwot: Now, sell your products across di globe with Kwot. We go give you one powerful but easy-to-use platform wey go help you maximize your market reach.
b2b_online_market_place_note: Kwot B2B - di online marketplace for B2B buyers and sellers of African products don get global reach. Join us make you fit expand your presence globally.
expand_footprint: Expand your presence reach all corners of di globe with Kwot platform.
seller_buyer_needs_note: We understand say B2B sellers and buyers get different needs. Kwot B2B don design with dis for mind so we go help you sell more with less effort.
one_step_market_place_note: One-step e-commerce marketplace for buyers and sellers of African products.
single_administration_note: Single Window Administration for B2B & B2C Selling
product_b2b_b2c_note: Kwot allow you list your products for B2B and B2C customers. Dat one mean say you fit sell to both types of customers.
full_control_seller_note: Full control for sellers. You fit design di storefront and update product offers.
buyer_seller_market_place_note: Kwot B2B marketplace dey free for both buyers and sellers. Join today and enjoy all di benefits, for free!
b2b_market_place_product_note: Kwot B2B marketplace dey focus on authentic African products. If you dey interested for African products, you no fit miss dis platform.
buyer_access_profile_note: B2B Buyers fit access detailed profile of Sellers and fit see details of sellers' product certifications as well as production and quality control. Most sellers dey offer attractive volume discounts to attract bulk buyers.
single_profile_platform: I fit use one single profile to buy and sell for your platform?
individuals_seller_note: Yes, you fit create and use your profile to buy as well as sell for Kwot platform. Individuals, as well as SMEs, fit create the seller profile by providing the relevant details.
seller_profile_note: How long e go take to create seller profile? How much effort I go put to manage am?
create_seller_profile_note: Creating seller profile on Kwot and managing am dey easy! E go take you about 5 minutes to create your profile if you get all the required information. Similarly, managing the seller profile na simple process and most tasks fit dey accomplished within a few minutes.
seller_getting_order: Within how many days sellers fit start to get customer orders? Wetin be the support wey dey available?
after_create_seller_profile_note: After you don create your seller profile, your seller account go dey approved and live within one business day. You go fit receive and fulfil customer orders once your account don dey live. You go fit use the advertising service wey Kwot offer to promote your products and generate sales.
your_offer_service: Wetin be the services wey una offer to sellers?
seller_customisation_option: Wetin be the customisation options wey dey available to sellers?
provide_powerful_seller_note: Kwot provide powerful but easy-to-use solution for sellers. The seller dashboard get details about your orders, inventories, and revenues.
store_name_logo_note: You fit set up your Kwot store with your own unique name, brand logo, and banner image. The products for your store fit dey listed with photos, videos, and unique attributes like color and material. Sellers fit also provide order personalization options to buyers, for example, message tags and gift wrapping.
measure_product_facilitate: How you dey facilitate communication for made to measure products like bespoke clothes?
body_measurement_note: On top Kwot, we provide body measurement tool for buyers wey fit help them take body measurements remotely. This one dey useful for fashion vendors and made to measure clothes.
seller_discounts: Sellers fit offer discounts for some products?
yes_seller_discounts: Yes, sellers fit offer discounts for one or more products.
kwot_shipping_platform: How shipping dey handle for Kwot platform?
kwot_shipping_platform_note: DHL dey handle shipping for order fulfilment because dem dey provide reliable logistics support across the world.
hearing_for_you: We love to hear from you, so feel free to contact us.
understand_b2b_b2c_selling: We understand say B2B and B2C selling require different solutions.
start_few_minutes: We fit start you for just a few minutes.
built_customised_marketplace: We don build one different and customised marketplace for B2B sellers of African products. The platform na free to join.
create_kwot_account: I gats create Kwot account to buy tins for Kwot?
create_kwot_account_note: You fit buy tins for Kwot without creating account, but you go enta your details wey dem need like Shipping and Payment. But e go make sense if you create Kwot account for better experience.
benefits_kwot_account: Wetin I go gain if I create Kwot account?
benefits_kwot_account_note: Once you create Kwot account, you go fit track your order and see your order for one button. You go dey fit order tins for Kwot faster and easier because you no go dey enter Shipping and Payment details all the time. Plus, one account fit dey use to buy and sell for Kwot.
cancel_order_payment: I fit change or cancel my order after I don pay?
cancel_order_payment_note: Yes, you fit change or cancel your order after you don pay. Dem go refund your money back. You fit find more information for our Return policy.
return_receive_product: I fit return the product after I don receive am?
return_receive_product_note: Yes, you fit return the product after you don receive am. You go fit talk the reason why you wan return am and you go get refund for your account. We go fit handle the return shipping for you. You fit find more information for our Return policy.
provide_product_review: I fit provide review for Kwot products?
provide_product_review_note: Yes, you fit provide review for products wey dey Kwot platform. Your feedback go ginger us and e go help us improve. We encourage you make you give honest feedback about Kwot products.
How_can_contact_kwot_note: We dey always dey available for our customers. You fit contact us through the forms wey dey for the Feedback or Help & Contact page. You fit also send us email for admin@kwot.com
your_kwot_experience: How your Kwot experience be so far? Wetin you like about Kwot? Wetin you want make we improve or include for future releases?
appreciate_feedback: We really appreciate your feedback, e dey help us wella to improve.
enter_gift_card: If you get gift card, enter the code down so we go fit check how much credit you get
Gift_code_not_found: Oops! Gift code no dey available.
looks_like_gift_card: Oops! E look like say your gift card
credit_gift_card: The credit wey dey your gift card with
redeem_gift_card: You go fit use your gift card for your next
gift_shopping_easier_note: Because we sabi say e hard wella to get the size, colour and even the cloth wey go follow, we don make your gift shopping easy pass before.
Select_gift_purchase: Select gift card wey you wan buy
email_recipient: Email to the person wey go receive am
write_your_message_here: Write your message here (if you wan)
type_sender_name: Type the person wey send am name
select_reason_cancel_order: Select the reason why you wan cancel the order
why_return_product: Why you want return the product
poor_quality_expected: Poor Quality, e no reach my expectation
received_product_parts_missing: Product/ Parts no dey inside the package Wrong Item Received
product_different_ordered: Product different from wetin I order
refund_money: We go refund ya money within 7 business days
instructions_shipping_package: Instructions on how to ship the package
Products_returned_before: You must return the products before
received_request_return: We don receive ya request to return the order
amount_return_account_note: The amount of the order go return to ya account once we receive the product
search_item_note: You wan see the items wey people dey search pass?
product_search_tooltip: You dey see dis ad based on the relevance of the product to ya search query.
product_returnable_delivery: Dis product fit return witin 48 hours afta delivery
type_appear_product: Type wetin you wan appear for di product
product_available_currently: Dis product no dey available for now.
measurements_using_mobile: Once you pay, dem go ask you to provide di measurements if you get dem. If you no get dem, we go help you wit our remote body measuring app where you go use your phone scan your body take di measurements and submit am.
negotiate_product_price: You wan negotiate di price of di product?
want_gift_wrapped: I want make dem wrap am as gift
accept_purchase_conditions_note: I don read and accept di purchase conditions and I understand say dem go use my personal data as explained for di privacy policy
how_to_pack_note: Consider di weight, volume, value, and how fragile your product be make you fit decide di kind packaging wey go work. Make sure say di packaging follow di regulations. If you don send products to customers through DHL before, you fit already sabi di norms wey dem dey follow.
product_return_visibly: Product don show signs of use before return
product_damaged_after_buyer: Product don spoil afta buyer don collect am
type_message_buyer: Type your message to di buyer here
lot_number_quality_docs: Lot number and quality check documents
awaiting_measurement_details_buyer: We dey wait for di measurement details from di buyer
We dey wait for confirmation of payment.
you_purchase_shipping_label: You dey about to buy 1 shipping label
detected_the_account_email: We don detect the account with this email. You wan login?
Kwot_account_please_sign_in: If you get Kwot account, abeg sign in now to quickly place your order.
you_card_that_you: on top your card wey you fit use for future purchases.
not_refundable_note: Note:- Dis item no fit be refunded
will_provider_vendor: Dem go provide am by vendor
promo_gift_code_physical_items: Note:- Promo code / Gift code na only for physical items
confirm_tracking_box_note: by ticking the box, you confirm say you don read and agree to the terms of use and
enter_amount_credit: Enter the amount wey you wan credit.
subscription_join_note: Thanks say you join Kwot! We dey excited to get you on board. Abeg select and pay for your preferred subscription plan. Once you don subscribe, you go fit access our site and all the features wey e get.
subscription_join_things: Here na some things wey you go remember: Dem go charge you every month on the same day wey you subscribe. You fit cancel your subscription any time. If you get any question or you need help, feel free to contact us. We hope say you go enjoy our service!.
keep_things_title: Here na some things wey you go remember:
keep_things_note_one: Dem go charge you every month on the same day wey you sign up.
keep_things_note_two: You fit cancel your subscription any time.
keep_things_note_three: If you get any question or you need help, feel free to contact us. We hope say you go enjoy our service!
already_active_subscription_note: You don already get active subscription.
receive_payout_note: Customize when and how you want make you receive payouts
withdrawal_frequency_note: Dis one go trigger the withdrawal at the set frequency only when the available fund pass the set amount.
payment_option_note: Kwot Payments give buyers many payment options and e still give you Kwot's seller protection.
vendor_dashboard_note: We don introduct affiliate marketing for our platform. E don default enable for you wit 5% commission. You fit change am anytime you like.
renew_subscription: Your subscription don expire for KWOT. To renew your subscription, abeg
no_active_subscription_note: You no dey on any active subscription. Abeg subscribe to activate your account and start to use the platform, abeg
quick_note: Quick note: Always enter the latest amount we send-any deposit amounts we sent previously no go work.
store_budget_note: Your budget na key to driving the most traffic possible to your store - e determine how often your ads go show to buyers. You fit change am anytime
a_day_and_the_maximum_is: a day, and the maximum na
validity_of_discount_note: Set the dates wey this discount go dey active.
discount_applied_note: The discount go dey applied on top the products.
custom_packages_note: The package sizes wey you take ship your products go dey used when calculating shipping rates for checkout.
about_to_remove_package: You dey about to remove one package
see_discount_applied: Here you go see discount wey don apply
commission_note: Commission no fit be less than 5%
set_price_gift_wrapped: set the price wey you want if the user request make dem wrap the gift
reach_more_buyers_with_ads: Reach more buyers with Kwot Ads
reach_more_buyers_with_ads_note: Kwot Ads go make your products dey more prominent for Kwot search, for category pages and even for other product pages.
need_to_do_set_budget: All you need to do na set your budget and choose which product you wan promote.
stats_for_individual_advertised_products: Stats for your individual advertised products
success_ads_budget_note: Success! You dey advertise now wit budget of
ads_budget_sub_note: Your products dey appear higher for Kwot search results, e mean say you dey reach more buyers wey dey find items like your own. E dey important to keep your budget the same during the first 30 days of your campaign so we go fit identify trends for your traffic and help you drive the most visits possible to your store.
no_plan_subscribe_yet: You neva subscribe to any plan yet
are_you_cancel_subscription: You sure say you wan cancel subscription?
cancellation_affective: Cancellation go take effect for the end of your billing cycle.
restart_subscription_anytime: You fit restart your subscription anytime.
enable_gift_wrap_price_for_store: Abeg enable gift wrap price for your store.
options_defines: Which option dey define you pass?
part_of_company_note: You be part of one company wey get plenty workers
individual_seller_note: You be one person wey dey sell small-scale products one by one
input_otp_sent_mobile_number: Abeg put the OTP wey dem send to your mobile number
identifies_address_note: Put name wey go identify this address e.g. House / Store / Warehouse
package_dimensions_shipping_note: Package dimensions na to calculate shipping rates and package sizes. E fit dey different from the actual size of the product, as dem fit fold or compress the product for shipping.
dimensions_product_import_note: The dimensions of one product important to give accurate information to customers and to make sure say the product go fit inside the space wey the customer want. The dimensions still affect the shipping cost of the product.
enabling_product_returnable: If you enable this, the product go dey returnable
platform_markup_automatically: Note: One platform markup fee go automatically add to the price above
product_price_buyer: Note: Product Price wey the buyer go see for KWOT.
apply_discount_variations: Apply discount to all the variations
apply_different_discounts_variations: Apply different discounts for different variations
apply_product_depending_note: The following lines na where you fit manage the percentual discount wey you wan apply for the product based on the quantity wey your buyers buy
store_sell_product: Na which store you wan sell dis product?
editing_vendor_product: Warnin! You dey edit vendor product.
adding_under_categories: If you no fit find the attribute wey you dey find, try add/am enable dem under Categories
customers_discount_checkout: Customers go enta dis discount code for checkout.
limit_use_per_customer: Limit am to one use per customer
not_added_promotional_code: You never add any promotional code yet
add_promotional_code: Add promotional codes to give your buyers discount for their purchases.
withdraw_all_money_wallet: Abeg withdraw all your money from wallet
wait_your_orders_completed: Abeg wait make all your orders complete.
wait_payouts_completed: Abeg wait make the payouts complete.
Kwot_account_sign_in: If you get Kwot account, sign in for here.
product_required_measurements_note: Abeg enter all or only the measurements wey you need for the product(s) wey you dey buy. E.g. neck only for necklace or wrist only for wrist band or all measurements for clothing
iphone_android_open_camera_measurement: If you get iphone or android phone, open camera or app make you scan your measurement.
type_flat_number_letter: Type your flat number / or letter
click_here_to_read_the_new: Click here to read the new
payment_policy_text_1: Dis part of di business na how we plan take handle di payment process for every transaction wey happun for our platform.
payment_policy_text_2: Dis policy go dey accessible to Vendors and di KWOT management team for reference purposes and clarity as di matter fit be.
payment_policy_text_3: KWOT dey partner with both local bank (STANBIC IBTC) and International Payment Solutions platforms (Paystack) for now, to make di payment and funds transfer process easy for Vendors and ease tracking for KWOT admin.
payment_policy_text_4: KWOT don decide to use STANBIC IBTC as e Nigerian Settlement bank for every transaction wey dem complete with KWOT. As such, dis na di key tins for every vendor wen dem sign up with KWOT:
payment_policy_text_5: Make all vendors make sure say dem register with their Stanbic IBTC Account to collect payment
payment_policy_text_6: All vendors suppose use their active accounts to collect funds.
payment_policy_text_7: Vendors dey advised say di settlement date for StanbicIBTC toStanbic IBTC account na T+ 1(Transaction date wen amount bin dey received from KWOT + 1 day), while for other banks na T+ 2(Transaction date wen amount bin dey received from KWOT + 2 days) or fit dey longer for special cases.
the_end_to_end_vendor_payment_processing: di end-to-end vendor payment processing chain
payment_policy_text_8: At di end of every successful payment by di Buyer/ Once di funds don land for KWOTReceiving Bank Account, di following chain dey follow:
payment_policy_text_9: Dis na di normal processing time and fit slightly vary for special cases
payment_policy_text_10: When the BUYER get refund request, VENDORS go follow dis chain
explanation_refund_requests_handled_by_s: Explanation on how seller go handle refund requests
payment_policy_text_11: 1) For each refund request wey BUYER bring, SELLER go do im due diligence to confirm say the claim for refund na true based on KWOT RETURN POLICY. E dey bring two cases.
payment_policy_text_12: 2) If after the due diligence, the customer's claims no dey correct, CUSTOMER go hear say NO REFUND go happun.
payment_policy_text_13: 3) If the Customer's claims dey true and dem get strong evidence, Seller go give CUSTOMER two options: Make dem refund all the money or make dem exchange am for another item wey dey good.
payment_policy_text_14: 4) If the client choose immediate refund, the Seller go forfeit the money for that transaction.
payment_policy_text_15: 5) If the Customer choose exchange, the Seller money still dey unconfirmed until the Customer confirm say the item wey dem give am for exchange dey good.
payment_policy_text_16: Although KWOT don partner with well-experienced payment solution partners, sometimes wahala fit show face. Make una take note of the following points:
payment_policy_text_17: 1) Make una dey careful and type una bank details correctly.
payment_policy_text_18: 2) To make settlement easy, we advise Vendors make dem open account with our Local Settlement Bank Partner.
payment_policy_text_19: 3) Vendor fit check their available balance for their wallets after each transaction period (2 days). If dem notice any difference, make dem report give KWOT admin/helpdesk.
payment_policy_text_20: 4) If any case involve refund, make sure say the seller take responsibility for the transaction and make sure say e resolve the matter or make dem refund the money.
payment_policy_text_21: 5) If any case involve issue with the payment solution providers, make sure say una contact KWOT admin immediately make dem find solution.
payment_policy_text_22: 6) No be at all make vendor try to do transfer of money for another way apart from the one wey KWOT don set.
vendor_bank_account_details: Vendor bank account details/registration for KWOT
ads_budget_note: We go use your daily budget promote your products and deliver the best results for your ad spend. Set budget between $1 and $50, you fit change am anytime.
budget_keep_note_one: If you set higher budget, we go fit show your ads more often for places wey people go see am well well for Kwot.
budget_keep_note_two: To get the best results, think about make you maintain your budget the same for the first 30 days.
start_kwot_ads_steps: Start Kwot Ads for just small number of steps
kwot_ads_steps_note: Kwot Ads go make your products show for the top when people dey search for something for Kwot and for other places where people dey plenty. This one go help you reach millions of buyers wey dey interested.
goals_for_shop: First, tell us your goals so we fit give you the best results for your shop:
control_how_you_get_notifications: Control how you dey receive notifications
updates_related_financial_activity: Updates wey concern your financial activity
freshest_finds_and_latest_app_features: The latest discoveries and app features
pending_for_final_approval: E still dey wait for your final approval
pending_final_approval_by_admin: E still dey wait for final approval from the admin
receive_proposal_from_vendors: You never receive any proposal from vendors
